Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class View
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Default view component for the MVC model. This class builds GUI for the Plant vs Zombie game. Contains visual components such paths to the default images in the game.
    Version:
    21 November, 2018
    Author:
    Dmytro Sytnik (VanArman), Ahmed Romih (decarbonite)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      View()
      Default constructor that initialized window with board, barr with the score and current amount of money, and control buttons to place plants into the board.
